name: Magician (itch) (Mizuky)
description:
Help the little wizard recover his staff that was stolen in an adventure with magical monsters! You will be challenged by the evil boy, facing bosses. Are you worthy to reach the end and retrieve the staff?

To kill certain enemies, you will have to use the most effective element against them (example: water vs fire).

The game is not complete.

Controls:

Z = Attack

X = Element swap

Space/Up Arrow = Jump

Enter = Pause Menu

Shift = Help Menu
